charges.charge_disposition: Dft Feliciano Chacon pleaded guilty to count 5 of the Indictment on 7/5/02; Counts 1 &; 2 are dismissed on motion of the USA; Dft committed to custody of USBOP for a term of 60 months; Court recommends to BOP: that dft be designated to serve his term of imprisonment at a facility closest to Tucson, AZ (FPC Nellis); Dft participate in 500 hour drug rehabilitation program; Dft shall surrender for service of sentence at institution designated by BOP as notified by USM; Dft shall be on supervised rel ease for a term of 4 yrs; Standard conditions of supervision; Dft shall participate as directed in program approved by P.O. for treatment of narcotic addiction or drug or alcohol dependency...; Total assessment: $100.00; No fine imposed; No rest itution ordered;

charges.charge_disposition: Dft Jesus Manuel Chanez pleaded guilty to count 5 of indictment on 11/8/01; Dft committed to custody of USBOP for a term of 18 months; The Court recommends to BOP: Facility close to home in Arizona; Dft remanded to custody of USM; Supervised release for a term of 3 yrs; Standard conditions of supervision; Total assessment: $100.00; No fine imposed, no restitution ordered;

Dft William A. Gross pleaded guilty to count 1 of indictment on 10/19/01; Counts 2,3 &; 5 are dismissed on motion of USA; Dft committed to custody of USBOP for a term of 87 months; The Court RCMDS to BOP: Comprehensive drug treatment program; Dft rema nded to custody fo USM; Supervised release for a term of 4 yrs; Standard conditions of supervision; Dft shall submit to drug testing/treatment as directed by P.O.; Dft shall participate in mental health counseling focusing on domestic abuse and gambl ing addiction; Total assessment: $100.00; No fine imposed, no restitution ordered;

charges.charge_disposition: Dft Gerome Bates pleaded guilty 10 count 1 of indictment on 10/19/01; Count 4 is dismissed on motion of the USA; Dft committed to custody of USBOP for a term of 100 months; Court recommends to BOP: Comphrehensive Drug Treatment Program; Dft shall sur render for service of sentence... as notified by USM; Supervised release for a term of 4 yrs; Standard conditions of supervision; Dft shall submit to drug testing/treatment as directed by P.O.; Total assessment: $100.00;

Probation term of 3 yrs; standard conditions of supervision; dft shall participate in the Home Detention program for a period of 6 months; submit to drug testing and treatment as directed by the probation office; total assessment $100.00.

charges.charge_disposition: Dft Terry Wright pleaded guilty to count 2 of indictment on 10/19/02; Count 1 dismissed on motion of USA; Dft committed to custody of USBOP for a term of 33 months; Court recommends to BOP: Shock Incarceration Program; Dft shall surrender for service of sentence at institution designated by BOP as notified by USM; Supervised release for 3 yrs; Standard conditions of supervision; Dft shall submit to drug testing/treatment as directed by P.O.; Total assessment $100.00;
